meanings.definition: A person who takes photographs of astronomical objects.
meanings.sent1: The astrophotographer captured a stunning image of the moon and stars.
meanings.sent2: My friend is an astrophotographer who loves to photograph galaxies and planets.
meanings.sent3: The astrophotographer tried to take a picture of a shooting star but missed it!
meanings.sent4: The astrophotographer's camera is like a magic portal to the universe.
meanings.sent5: Becoming an astrophotographer allows you to explore the mysteries of space through your lens.

meanings.definition: The act of taking photographs of celestial objects.
meanings.sent1: Astrophotography requires patience and precision to capture the beauty of the night sky.
meanings.sent2: I find astrophotographer fascinating because it allows us to see beyond our world.
meanings.sent3: During the meteor shower, the astrophotographer was busy capturing the cosmic spectacle.
meanings.sent4: Astrophotography is like painting with light from the stars.
meanings.sent5: The art of astrophotographer reveals the wonders of the universe in a single frame.
